title: 98/558/EC: Council Decision of 28 September 1998 authorising the Portuguese Republic to extend until 7 March 1999 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 28 September 1998 authorising the Portuguese Republic to extend until 7 March 1999 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa (98/558/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The Portuguese Republic is hereby authorised to extend until 7 March 1999 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa which entered into force on 9 April 1979.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 September 1998.
For the Council
The President
W. MOLTERER
(1) OJ L 164, 21. 6. 1997, p. 36.
